'''Nameless Islet Mural''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtainable from the {{Quest|The Other Side of Isle and Sea}}. The Quest can be started by interacting with any of the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/1.6|Golden Apple Archipelago]]'s Murals.

The mural is painted on a rock at the top of the Nameless Islet. Access to this islet requires the {{Quest|A Trip Through Fog and Wind|A Trip Through Wind and Fog}} to be either in progress or completed.

{{Quote|They must have left this island. Let's hope that their voyage went smoothly this time...|Paimon, after completing [[The Other Side of Isle and Sea]]}}
{{clr}}
